recipes.title: Simple Rice Porridge
recipes.summary: A basic and comforting rice porridge.
ingredients: 4 cups water or broth (chicken or vegetable)
steps: Rinse the rice under cold water.
Combine rice and water/broth in a pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until rice is tender and creamy. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking.

recipes.title: Savory Rice Soup with Herbs
recipes.summary: A flavorful rice soup with herbs.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried herbs (Italian mix, or thyme/oregano)
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot. Saute onion and garlic until softened.
Add rice and stir for 1 minute.
Pour in water/broth and add herbs.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes, or until rice is cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Sweet Rice Soup with Cinnamon
recipes.summary: A sweet and comforting rice soup with cinnamon.
ingredients: 4 cups water or milk (dairy or plant-based)
steps: Combine rice, water/milk, cinnamon stick, and ground cinnamon in a pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until rice is cooked and creamy.
If desired, stir in sugar or honey to taste.
